item.title: Traffic Light Timings Need Adjusting, 18th April
item.description:
Following the opening of the M&S food, the traffic light timings need adjusting to allow enough vehicles to exit the retail park car parking. Current timings are causing huge congestion within the retail park unnecessarily.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Old abandoned temporary road sign, 18th April
item.description:
Very old (very large) temporary road sign abandoned in the verge. It may be difficult to see in the photo as it is partially hidden by vegetation. At what3words address:- ///exist.owners.shins https://w3w.co/exist.owners.shins I would be grateful if you would removed. Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury

item.title: Multiple pot holes, 18th April
item.description:
I ride a bike and drive a car and have to drive/cycle round them. These have been fixed many times but continue to be a problem. They are deep in some places and impossible to ride or drive through them . Please help stop putting cyclists in danger.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Alma Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Jaguar car abandoned on roadside half on pavement half on road. Obstructing pavement, road and safe visibility turning out of Highland Road onto Sandy Lane., 17th April
item.description:
Vehicle (Jaguar car) obstructing pavement, road and visibility for past month. Needs moving off road and pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 62, Sandy Lane, Cheltenham

item.title: Many pot holes and road surface extremely poor, 17th April
item.description:
Much of Harp Hill is a problem. The road surface has been deteriorating for past 2 - 3 yrs. The top end is particularly bad and motorists swerving pot holes causing near misses with other motorists and pedestrians.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harp Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 10inch, localised, deep pothole., 17th April
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greenway Lane, Cheltenham
